description: This file defines a mock implementation of various store-related interfaces for testing purposes. It uses Google Mock to create mock methods for the PersistentStoreImplementationMock class, which implements multiple interfaces such as IStore, IStore2, IStoreCache, IStoreInspector, and IStoreLimit.

classes.name: PersistentStoreImplementationMock
classes.description: A mock class for testing PersistentStore implementation, mocking multiple store interfaces, including notification, key-value management, and namespace limits.

methods.name: ~PersistentStoreImplementationMock
methods.description: Destructor for the mock class, defaulted.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks registration of a notification callback.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks unregistration of a notification callback.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Mocks setting a key-value pair in the store, with an optional namespace.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Mocks retrieving a value for a given key and namespace.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Mocks deleting a specific key in a namespace.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Mocks setting a scoped value with TTL.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Mocks retrieving a scoped value and TTL.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Mocks deleting a key within a scope.

methods.name: DeleteNamespace
methods.description: Mocks deleting a namespace within a scope.

methods.name: GetKeys
methods.description: Mocks retrieving keys within a scope and namespace.

methods.name: GetNamespaces
methods.description: Mocks retrieving namespaces within a scope.
